title: Who is Kilmar Ábrego García and why has his case become a lightning rod for Trump’s immigration crackdown?
description: The Trump administration plans to deport Ábrego to Uganda after a months-long saga that saw him wrongfully deported to El Salvador
content:
The Trump administration has said it plans to deport Kilmar Ábrego García to Uganda, months after he was mistakenly sent to El Salvador, in a case that has become a flashpoint in the president’s wider crackdown on immigration.

title: Pentagon has blocked Ukraine from striking deep inside Russia - report
description: Wall Street Journal says move is part of Trump administration’s effort to get Putin into peace talks
content: US defense officials have blocked Ukraine from using US-supplied long-range missiles to strike targets inside Russia since late spring as part of a Trump administration effort to get Vladimir Putin to engage in peace talks , according to a report on ... [2684 chars]
